name: TempTation
0:
”Alexa, tell Temp Tation that I see cookies.”
”Alexa, tell Temp Tation that I'm dealing with a crazy person.”
”Alexa, tell Temp Tation to give me strength.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: temp tation
des:
Break the habit loop when you encounter temptation. Ask Alexa to tell Temp Tation the temptation that you've run across. You'll get a quick shot of positivity and a few seconds to move away from the temptation. Avoid falling prey to temptation!

Try any dessert, drink, tv show, sport, actor, or famous person.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
